In practice, the use of a model integrating immune response dynamics has been limited by the fact that parameter estimation requires to measure several markers longitudinally (such as IFN and viremia) during the short period of time where these markers are detectable.
56 ,
64 This is obviously difficult in humans (due to the difficulty to identify viral infection before symptoms occur) but also in animal models, due to the limitation in the frequency and the volume that can be performed.
